audioText: Ces enfants sont nés ostensiblement dans un environnement privilégié avec toutes les patte dorées imaginables.
question: What kind of environment were these children born into?
options: These children were obviously born into a privileged environment with all imaginable golden opportunities
These children were born into poverty and hardship
These children were born in a rural farming community
These children were born in a simple middle-class family
explanation: The text states 'Ces enfants sont nés ostensiblement dans un environnement privilégié avec toutes les patte dorées imaginables' - These children were obviously born into a privileged environment with all imaginable golden opportunities. 'Nés' is the masculine plural past participle of 'naître' (to be born), with missing adverb 'ostensiblement' (obviously) and noun 'patte' (paw/opportunity, informal).
